DOC.brief_summary: This clinical trial study gene analysis study susceptibility Wilms tumor . Finding genetic marker Wilms tumor may help identify patient risk relapse .
DOC.brief_title: Gene Analysis Studying Susceptibility Wilms Tumor
DOC.detailed_description: PRIMARY OBJECTIVES : I . To use genome-wide association analysis identify novel genetic variant confer susceptibility Wilms tumor . II . To improve understanding genetic architecture etiology Wilms tumor . III . To facilitate identification genetic marker associate increase risk develop Wilms tumor and/or risk aggressive disease , relapse , additional tumor and/or cancer offspring . OUTLINE : Samples analyze single nucleotide polymorphism ( SNP ) profile use real-time polymerase chain reaction ( PCR ) multiplex ligation-dependent probe amplification ( MLPA ) .
DOC.criteria: 3000 sample 1958 Birth Cohort ( 58C ) 3000 UK Blood Service control series ( NBS )
